ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Re-type SSN is the same as the SSN entered.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sole_Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", NOT(ISBLANK(SSN__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Re_type_SSN__c )), SSN__c <> Re_type_SSN__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that SSN and Re-typed SSN match.
